# normal

**Instance Property**

The appearance data to apply to the tab bar item when it’s enabled, unselected, and not the focused item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var normal: UITabBarItemStateAppearance { get }
```

## Discussion

To set the attributes for this state, get the object in this property and modify it.

## Configuring attributes for different item states

- **selected**: The appearance data to apply to the tab bar item when it’s selected.
- **disabled**: The appearance data to apply to the tab bar item when it’s disabled.
- **focused**: The appearance data to apply to the tab bar item when it’s focused.

items.description: The appearance data to apply to the tab bar item when it’s selected.
